app.name: matrix-authentication-service
app.technical_description: OpenID Connect discovery document: %(discovery_url)s

privacy_policy.alt: Link to the service privacy policy

terms_and_conditions.alt: Link to the service terms and conditions

add_email.description: Enter an email address to recover your account in case you lose access to it.
add_email.heading: Add an email address

change_password.description: This will change the password on your account.
change_password.heading: Change my password

verify.body_html: Your verification code to confirm this email address is: %(code)s
verify.body_text: Your verification code to confirm this email address is: %(code)s
verify.subject: Your email verification code is: %(code)s

not_found.description: The page you were looking for doesn't exist or has been moved
not_found.heading: Page not found

policy_violation.description: This might be because of the client which authored the request, the currently logged in user, or the request itself.
policy_violation.heading: The authorization request was denied the policy enforced by this service

create_account.description: Please create an account to get started:
create_account.heading: Create an account

register.terms_of_service: I agree to the Terms and Conditions

scope.edit_profile: Edit your profile and contact details
scope.mas_admin: Administer any user on the matrix-authentication-service
scope.send_messages: Send new messages on your behalf
scope.view_messages: View your existing messages and data
scope.view_profile: See your profile info and contact details

link_mismatch.heading: This upstream account is already linked to another account.

register.forced_display_name: Will use the following display name
register.forced_email: De volgende e-mailadres zal worden gebruikt
register.forced_localpart: De volgende gebruikersnaam zal worden gebruikt

import_data.description: Confirm the information that will be linked to your new %(server_name)s account.
import_data.heading: Importeer uw data

verify_email.description: Voer de 6-cijferige code in die is verzonden naar: %(email)s
verify_email.headline: Verifieer uw e-mailadres
